item.description:
Wolves are one of the intelligent, beautiful and misunderstood animals on our planet-
Come join us and get to know and see these awesome creatures first hand, and up close,
and learn the truth about their behavior and their lives at the Wolf Walk & Talk in Gardner
Mass.

The Wolf Talk & Walk goes from 5:00- 7:00 pm

We will meet at the santuary around 4:45 and the educational talk will begin promptly at 6:00 pm
outside the wolves outer fence.

Then we will all be going on a 45 min EASY walk, with rest stops in between through the woods with
Denahee, one of their youngest, friendly, and least shy wolves.

When we arrive at the pine grove, everyone can pet Denahee, have pictures taken with him, and have a group photo shot.

Then we will continue on to the cliffs, where everyone will do a group "howl" and be able to hear
the pack answer.

Lastly, we will go and overlook the santuary, where you can see and take pictures of the whole pack without fences.

Following our wolf expedition, we will be going to a restaurant called Southside Grill
at about 8:15 for dinner. They have Mexican Food, as well as Prime Rib, Chicken, and b-b-que ribs,
and awesome margueritas! :)

The cost of the Wolf Walk & Talk is $30.00 per adult (not sure how much for kids)
and they will give us the group rate of $20.00 if we have 20 + people.

PLEASE BRING CASH to the Wolf Talk and dinner-

Come share with me my love for wolves!!! :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Check out their website here: (also check out the picture page!)

http://www.wolftalk.n....

We will be having dinner at Southside Grill in Gardner Mass- Check out their site here:

http://www.southsidem....
item.name: Meet the Wolves! - Educational Talk & Walk
